verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Christ has for sin atonement made, What a wonderful Savior! We are redeemed! the price is paid! What a wonderful Savior!

verse.name: c
verse.lines: What a wonderful Savior is Jesus, my Jesus! What a wonderful Savior is Jesus, my Lord!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I praise Him for the cleansing blood, What a wonderful Savior! That reconciled my soul to God; What a wonderful Savior!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He cleansed my heart from all its sin, What a wonderful Savior! And now He reigns and rules therein; What a wonderful Savior!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: He gives me overcoming pow'r, What a wonderful Savior! And triumph in each trying hour; What a wonderful Savior!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: To Him I've given all my heart, What a wonderful Savior! The world shall never share a part; What a wonderful Savior!
